I don't know enough to know precisely what's taking place, but that tends not to be helpful, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld said on radio broadcast.`` I'm hoping there is effective private diplomacy taking place... and the turmoil that we are seeing will ease,'' he said. Donald Rumsfeld recalls telling him that what is happening is hurting you. If it gets to a point where the solution is for me to leave, I will do so in a second. `` That's a crappy solution,'' Bush said.
